response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you is $100, I propose a fair price of $95 for this exceptional item. This offer allows you to acquire it at a slight premium over its cost to me, ensuring both parties benefit. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 95}
